values.alarm_description: Messages are landing in the DLQ.

after.alarm_description: Messages are landing in the DLQ.

s3_bucket_name.description: Name of the S3 bucket for CSV uploads.

sqs_queue_arn.description: ARN of the main SQS queue.

sqs_queue_url.description: URL of the main SQS queue.

alarm_description.constant_value: Messages are landing in the DLQ.

enable_s3_read.description: Whether to grant Lambda permission to read objects from the S3 bucket.

lambda_artifact_path.description: Path to the Lambda deployment package (zip) containing the bootstrap binary.

lambda_sqs_batch_size.description: Number of messages to send to the Lambda function in each batch.

lambda_sqs_maximum_batching_window_secon.description: Maximum batching window in seconds for SQS event source mapping.

log_retention_days.description: CloudWatch log group retention in days.

name_prefix.description: Prefix used for naming AWS resources.

s3_event_prefix.description: Optional S3 key prefix filter for notifications (e.g., 'incoming/'). Empty means no prefix filter.

s3_event_suffix.description: Optional S3 key suffix filter for notifications (e.g., '.csv'). Empty means no suffix filter.

sqs_max_receive_count.description: How many times a message can be received before moving to DLQ.

sqs_visibility_timeout_seconds.description: Visibility timeout for the main SQS queue. Should be >= Lambda timeout.

tags.description: Tags to apply to all resources.
